resources.string: Note: Your version of Android is too old to use the file picker. You have to input the location of the file manually. The files will be saved to Download folder in the internal storage.
Ask where to save the file each time (if disabled, write the AntiSplitted APK to the same directory where the split file was from)
Storage permission is required to save to the same dir as the selected file
Could not find the filepath of the selected file; saving to
